CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 21, 1970, pg. 6, reads: "REHEARSAL FOR THE CONCERT, which will take place at Warren United Methodist Church, 2606 Centre Ave., Sunday, March 22 at 5 P.M., has the undivided attention of these 48 Sisters of Mercy of the Pittsburgh Catholic Diocese. Mrs. Virginia Carter Lewis, standing, master musician, will direct the Sisters Chorus in concert of sacred music on Palm Sunday afternoon.  Mrs. Lewis is director of music at Warren Church, and also directs Allderdice High School Chorus.  Members of the Wesleyan Service Guild, sponsors of the unique program, will greet their guests during the Fellowship House, which will conclude the afternoon's activities. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Choir of Sisters of Mercy nuns wearing habits, seated at desks holding sheet music and singing, directed by Virginia Carter Lewis standing with raised arm beside piano, in classroom
